alert.note: Alert for Central Yampa River Basin; Lower Yampa River Basin (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 31 at 1:51PM MST until January 02 at 12:00PM MST by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO NOON MST MONDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation of freezing rain and snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 6 inches with locally higher amounts possible and ice accumulations of around one tenth of an inch. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Lower Yampa River Basin and Central Yampa River Basin. * WHEN...From 6 PM this evening to noon MST Monday. * IMPACTS...Sidewalks and roads will be very slick and result in hazardous driving conditions. Icing on trees and powerlines may result in localized power outages. A detailed map of the snowfall can be found at: www.weather.gov/gjt/winter. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Freezing rain will be possible beginning this evening and continuing through Sunday morning before precipitation changes over to snow. Expect periodic breaks in showers at times.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Central Yampa River Basin; Lower Yampa River Basin
